attributes.action: To stop Bots being used to quickly log orders and checkout
attributes.additional_details: If the government ban these computer bots from being used on websites actual people would be able to actually get goods like festival tickets, games consoles, trainers instead of paying ridiculous prices that scalpers inflate to rob the honest hard working people!
attributes.background: To ban Bots like Carnage being used to quickly log orders and checkout - this far quicker than any normal person can do it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561986
